TopicTitle: Trying to use Saitek Proflight Yoke + Throttle Quadrant + Proflight Rudder Pedals

Articles.Content: Hey Anyone Else trying to use the Proflight Yoke system for KSP? The game detects everything, but I am having some challenges mapping the correct axis. For example when turning the yoke to map "Roll", KSP detects that as "Rudder Pedal Axis 1." I would be interested to hear of anyone has a reliable configuration for the Yoke and Pedals setup.
I recently installed Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and set up KSP and the Saitek Yoke and Pedals. I experience the same issues with axis mapping so it is probably not a driver related issue.
